com.adobe.cq.social.commons.comments.api

Interface CommentCollection<C extends Comment,T extends CommentCollectionConfiguration>

  • Type Parameters:
    C - comment
    All Superinterfaces:
    SocialCollectionComponent, SocialComponent
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Calendar, FileLibrary<P,C>, Forum<P,C>, Journal, MessageBoxSocialComponent<P,C>, ReviewCollectionSocialComponent<C,T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCommentCollection, AbstractFileLibrary, AbstractForum, AbstractReviewCollection

    public interface CommentCollection<C extends Comment,T extends CommentCollectionConfiguration>
extends SocialCollectionComponent
    A CommentCollection represents a collection of Comments. Comments can be added to and removed from the collection. A collection is tied to a specific target (e.g. the page, asset or node that was commented on) - see com.adobe.cq.social.commons.impl.CommentInfo#getTarget().

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface com.adobe.cq.social.scf.SocialComponent

        CSV_SELECTOR, DEFAULT_SELECTOR, INDEX_SELECTOR, PROP_REFERER, QUERY_SELECTOR, TRANSLATE_SELECTOR
